title: Scribal Lab — Manuscripts & Hermetic Calligraphy
summary: Recreate rubricated manuscripts with parchment, oak-gall ink emulation, and calm goldleaf.
safe_use: Muted palettes; no high-contrast black/white; slow gestures; no flicker.
procedures: Lay parchment ground; draw faint baselines at 6–8% opacity.
Set body text (EB Garamond) at gentle gray; rubricate initials in vermilion.
Apply goldleaf overlay to margins/initials; keep shimmer static (ND-safe).
